about_the_game:
Get ready for an intense battle inside a futuristic military complex, where every corridor hides a new deadly threat. As a kidnapped engineer, you must fight your way out of this technological nightmare. Face elite soldiers, war machines, and rogue experiments as you search for an escape. Will you have the strength to survive, or will you become just another victim of this brutal facility?

FEATURES

Striking retro-style visuals

Graphics inspired by classic 90s FPS games, blending pixelated brutality with detailed industrial environments. Explosive effects and modern lighting enhance the nostalgic yet intense visual experience.

Dive into fast-paced combat

Arm yourself and face relentless enemies in high-speed firefights. Cybernetic soldiers, mutant creatures, and mechanized units demand quick reflexes and deadly accuracy. Each enemy has unique attack patterns, making every encounter unpredictable.

Gear up for war

Find and wield a devastating arsenal, from shotguns and machine guns to high-tech experimental weapons. Adapt your strategy by choosing the right tool for every situation and obliterate anything in your path.

Uncover hidden secrets

Explore maze-like corridors, locked doors, and restricted areas filled with surprises. Search for hidden passages, essential supplies, and intel that may reveal the base’s darkest secrets. Only the most observant will uncover everything.

An electrifying soundtrack

A powerful mix of heavy guitar riffs and pulsating synths fuels every battle, heightening the adrenaline and making every firefight even more intense. Take on hordes of enemies to a soundtrack that keeps the action relentless.

name: Nexus Overdrive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 4150
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4150
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: A retro-style FPS where a kidnapped engineer must fight through a futuristic military base filled with deadly enemies, hidden secrets, and relentless action. Arm yourself, move fast, and survive!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
